All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActivityLog
Represents an activity log entry that records user actions within the internship management system.
ApplicationRepository
Repository interface for accessing and managing internship application data.
ApplicationStatus
Enumeration representing the possible statuses of an internship application.
AuthenticationManager
Manager class for handling user authentication and type determination.
AuthenticationService
Service class responsible for handling user authentication operations.
AuthorizationService
Service class responsible for authorization and user type determination.
CareerCenterStaff
Represents a career center staff member in the internship management system.
CareerCenterStaffManager
Manager class for career center staff operations.
CompanyRepMenu
User interface menu for company representative users.
CompanyRepresentative
Represents a company representative who posts internship positions on the platform.
CompanyRepresentativeManager
Manager class for company representative operations.
DataManager
 
DataPersistenceService
Service class for coordinating data persistence operations.
FilePathConfiguration
Configuration class for managing file paths used by the system.
FilterManager
Manager for filtering and sorting internship data based on various criteria.
Internship
Represents an internship position offered by a company.
InternshipApp
Main entry point for the Internship Management System application.
InternshipApplication
Represents a student's application for an internship position.
InternshipFilterStrategy
Strategy class for filtering internships using predicate-based filtering.
InternshipFilterStrategy.InternshipPredicate
 
InternshipLevel
Enumeration representing the three difficulty levels for internship positions.
InternshipRepository
Repository interface for accessing and managing internship data.
InternshipStatus
Enumeration representing the possible statuses of an internship posting.
MainMenu
Main menu interface for the Internship Management System.
MajorUtils
Utility class for managing academic majors and specializations available in the system.
PersistenceManager
Interface for managing data persistence operations.
RoleSpecificInterfaces
Container class for role-specific interfaces following the Interface Segregation Principle.
RoleSpecificInterfaces.Applicationable
Interface for entities that can manage applications (e.g., Student, Internship).
RoleSpecificInterfaces.Approvable
Interface for entities that can be approved or rejected (e.g., CompanyRepresentative, Internship).
RoleSpecificInterfaces.Internshipable
Interface for entities that can manage internships (e.g., CompanyRepresentative).
RoleSpecificInterfaces.Loggable
Interface for activity log entries that can be logged (e.g., ActivityLog).
RoleSpecificInterfaces.PasswordChangeable
Interface for entities that support password management (e.g., User).
RoleSpecificInterfaces.Registrable
Interface for entities that can be registered in the system (e.g., User).
StaffMenu
User interface menu for career center staff users.
Student
Represents a student user in the internship management system.
StudentApplicationManager
Manager for student application operations using repository pattern.
StudentInternshipDiscoveryManager
Manager for internship discovery operations for students using repository pattern.
StudentManager
Manager class for student-related operations including internship discovery and application management.
StudentMenu
User interface menu for student users.
StudentRepository
Repository interface for accessing and managing student data.
User
Abstract base class representing a user in the internship management system.
UserRepository
Repository interface for accessing and managing user data.
